content.text: I'm doing well! Just got back from a run.
Nice! I'm trying to get in shape, but I'm not a big fan of running.
What do you like to do for exercise?
I like to go for walks with my dog, and I also like to lift weights.
That's cool! I'm not really into lifting weights, but I love walking and hiking.
I want to learn how to knit sweaters. I think it would be a fun hobby.
That's a great idea! I've been wanting to learn how to knit for a while, but I haven't had the time.
Maybe we could start a knitting club together!
That's a great idea! I'd love to learn how to knit from you.
Awesome! I'll start looking for some knitting patterns.
Great! I'll start gathering some yarn.
